item.title: 格式
item.description: 1.文字 a：百度一下 呵呵 2.代码 console.log("Hello"); var num1, num2, sum; num1 = prompt("Enter first number"); num2 = prompt("Enter second number"); sum = parseInt(num1) + parseInt(num2); // "+" means "add" alert("Sum = " + sum); // "+" means combine into a string 3.文本 测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、测试文本、 4.图片 泳池派对限时抢购 figure-left In a libero varius, luctus ligula et, bibendum tortor. Sed sit amet dui malesuada, mattis justo id, ultricies enim.

item.title: The "figure" Shortcode
item.description: Hugo has figure shortcode built in, so you can easily add figcaptions or hyperlink rel attributes to images. Documentations can be found here: https://gohugo.io/content-management/shortcodes/#figure This theme has 3 CSS classes made for figure elements: big: images will break the width limit of main content area. left: images will float to the left. right: images will float to the right. If a figure has no class set, the image will behave just like a normal markdown image: !

item.title: Post With Featured Image
item.description: Just define the image URL in the content’s front matter, the featured image will be displayed as the background. For example: ---images:- https://picsum.photos/1024/768/?random---This is an array, you can set multiple urls, only the first url will be used. These images is also used in Twitter Cards and the Open Graph metadata.
